title: Episode 714 - Daniel Clowes / Ezra Edelman
itunes:title: Episode 714 - Daniel Clowes / Ezra Edelman
description:
Cartoonist and writer Daniel Clowes brings the world of underground comics into Marc's garage. They talk about the great comic artists who paved the way, the difficulty in translating some graphic novels to film, and the similarities between creating comics and performing standup. Plus, filmmaker Ezra Edelman stops by to talk with Marc about his documentary OJ: Made in America.

Sign up here for WTF+ to get the full show archives and weekly bonus material! https://plus.acast.com/s/wtf-with-marc-maron-podcast.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
